about_the_game:
．Game Features

- Randomly generated dungeon maze levels, allowing players to control the male protagonist and two interchangeable partners for the adventure, with a total of six stages.

- A single-ending visual novel with full Japanese voice acting for all female characters. The gameplay duration is approximately 2 hours.

．Introduction

(All characters in the game are over 20 years old.)

Set in a fantasy world, the story follows a group of companions who embark on an adventure to help a fallen princess reclaim her throne. They will wield the Pillar of Heroes and defeat the Armed Maid Corps!

．Story

In the otherworldly kingdom of Tristia, the death of the king has sparked a civil war over the throne. The young Princess Fia is forced to flee the castle and, in a moment of desperation, uses an ancient summoning spell to call forth a legendary hero from another world.

This hero turns out to be a modern-day youth who is obsessed with maid culture. Upon learning that the princess is being hunted by an evil armed maid corps, he decides to accept her plea, becoming the hero she needs and setting off on a journey to find the fragments of the "Proof of Succession."

Throughout this journey, he will face powerful armed maids, magical creatures, and mysterious allies, ultimately uncovering the truth behind the kingdom's civil war and becoming the true hero who will lead Tristia to a new era.

．The Game Description

In this perilous dungeon adventure game, players will enter a world full of challenges and dangers, exploring the deepest parts of the dungeon in search of powerful enemies lurking within. Each dungeon features a variety of enemies, all awaiting the player's challenge. As the levels progress, uniquely styled female bosses will appear one after another, bringing more difficult battles for the players to face.

Throughout this adventure, players will fight alongside a diverse group of female companions, each with their own unique abilities. Strategically pairing different companions will be the key to conquering each level. Whether it’s the hero who wields a holy sword that unleashes powerful sword energy, the technician who excels at tossing bombs to create area explosions, or the mage who casts elegant magic projectiles for continuous attacks, every companion will play a crucial role in the battles.

As players delve deeper into the dungeon, they will journey towards the heart of the maze. The ultimate goal is to help the princess reclaim her rightful place on the throne, completing this glorious adventure. The game combines refined combat design with character synergy, offering players an exhilarating combat experience and a wealth of strategic choices as they embark on the path of a hero to save the kingdom.

．Characters

菲亞

CV:桃瀬ひな（Momose Hina）

The princess has been beloved by her people since childhood due to her exceptional charisma. However, the sudden death of the king has complicated the issue of succession, thrusting her into the center of the kingdom's turbulent power struggles. As tensions rise, an armed maid corps is dispatched to eliminate her. These maids are omnipresent, always ready to deliver a fatal blow to the princess. Under such a threat, the princess must find trustworthy allies to help her escape and safeguard the future of the kingdom. Over time, she realizes that she is not only the key to the throne but also the lifeblood of the entire kingdom's destiny.

莉婕

CV:緑川蘭（Midorikawa Ran）

The princess’s personal maid is not only fiercely loyal but also her closest friend since childhood. She is agile, skilled in various combat techniques and magic. To protect the princess and help her reclaim her right to the throne, she flees the castle alongside her. She silently guards the princess, accompanying her on this perilous and uncertain journey.

蒂拉

CV:ちょこくりぃむ(Choco Cream)

A dark elf girl who was sold as a slave by traders possesses immense magical power. However, years of enslavement and abuse have made her cold and reclusive, causing her to lose trust in the world. One day, she encounters the protagonist’s group. Not only does the protagonist see through her pain, but he also risks his life to rescue her. Moved by the courage and kindness of the protagonist’s group, the dark elf girl begins to open her heart, gradually building trust and becoming an indispensable ally.

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.

Content Warning: "The Voyage to Another World" This game contains the following sexual acts:

‧Exposed nudity
‧genitalia
‧oral sex
‧contains suggestive themes
‧brief depictions of threats and harassment
‧mild violence and interspecies sex
‧erotic objects placed in a female character's vagina
‧sexual acts involving other fictional creatures
‧scenes of physical bondage (but not strangulation)

The game features both consensual and non-consensual sex. Not suitable for all ages and not suitable for viewing in the workplace.

name: 異世界女僕征途

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS10+
  • Processor: Intel i3-2000
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS10+
  • Processor: Intel i7-7700K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: The summoned hero, determined to help the distressed princess reclaim her throne, boldly embarks on an adventure to overthrow the armed brigade of warrior maidens!
